Description : ESCALA, gorgeous electronic string quartet, which caused a sensation in the final of the British TV competition Got Talent 2008 (ITV). The prize of the contest Got Talent 2008 was the creation of the album, which later produced the Trevor Horn (producer Cher, Seal, Paul McCartney, Pet Shop Boys, Charlotte Church, Mike Oldfield and many other famous musicians). Debut (release) of the album took place the 25th of May. Fusion of modern sounds with classical instruments - is ESCALA. As noted by music critics, Escala playing in a new, progressive style, has every reason to storm the top of the music charts. quartet Escala - four beautiful, intelligent, athletic 25-year-old girls. They are talented, professional musicians who studied at the most prestigious music colleges in London, and who spoke with the most well-known international artists and ensembles. These girls became close friends when the group was created for the musical performances in the tour boyband McFly. After this tour, they decided to create a group Escala. First performance on British competition Got Talent 2008 oschelomlyayuschy brought them success. 14 million viewers watched the audience finals, the entire concert hall and even the jury applauded them standing. Immediately signed a contract with Simon Cowell and company Syco Entertainment.
